fields.Title: LAIR ORB / shot viscal
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.bunker_pamphlets"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.feld_slit_window_seen_inside"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.orb_where_shot_came_viscal_done"] == false
fields.Description: You decide that the shot that killed the merc couldn't have come from this bunker.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The lights of Martinaise shine cool..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lights of Martinaise shine coolly in the clear night.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a great place to hide, certai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a great place to hide, certainly, but there hasn't been anyone in here for ages."
fields.Alternate1: "It is a great place to hide, and Mazovianism and killing are certainly not mutually exclusive. But there hasn't been anyone here in ages."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Outside the window -- the day is cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Outside the window -- the day is clear, and as mild as can be in early spring.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This does look like an *embrasure*,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This does look like an *embrasure*, a slit made for shooting out of.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "No, it's not. No matter how you cra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, it's not. No matter how you crane your neck, you can't see the whole of the Whirling-in-Rags, and certainly not the relevant segment of the top floor.

fields.Title: Authority: "The lieutenant's voice betrays a sl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's voice betrays a slight disappointment, which he glosses over by reasserting control.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Indeed. No one could get a clear v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Indeed. No one could get a clear view. Well, at least we've been thorough. I like thorough."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a great place to hide, certai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a great place to hide, certainly, but there hasn't been anyone here in ages."
fields.Alternate1: "It's a great place to hide, and Mazovianism and murder are certainly not mutually exclusive. But there hasn't been anyone here in ages."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In fact -- I think we're done with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In fact -- I think we're done with this bunker." He looks to the exit. "After you, officer."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "In the darkness, you can barely mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the darkness, you can barely make out the falling snow. It settles, making the night still quieter.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Outside the window -- another day...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Outside the window -- another day. The beach sand soaks up the drizzling rain, growing darker and darker.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It's definitely a good place to hid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's definitely a good place to hide. You barely found it yourself.
fields.Alternate1: It's definitely a good place to hide. Mazovians know how to lay low.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Outside the window -- desolation. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Outside the window -- desolation. Snow falls softly onto the coastal sand, where it melts almost instantly. On rooftops, it lingers.

fields.Title: You: "Peek out."
fields.Dialogue Text: Peek out.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You hear the rain's susurration acr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear the rain's susurration across the sea water. The night shudders.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, I can't see the Whirling-in-R..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, I can't see the Whirling-in-Rags... The shot didn't come from here." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: "Would this have been a good hideout..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Would this have been a good hideout for a sniper?
fields.Alternate1: (Turn to Kim.) "Could the killer have used this as a hideout?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It's a good place to hide, but does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a good place to hide, but doesn't look like anyone has stayed here in a while.
fields.Alternate1: It's a good place to hide, but doesn't look like anyone -- Mazovian or murderer -- has stayed here in a while.

fields.Title: You: "Is it feasible to hit a target in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it feasible to hit a target in the Whirling-in-Rags from this window? (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Could this have been the killer's h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Could this have been the killer's hideout, and this narrow window -- the point of origin of the shot that killed the mercenary?
